name: Pistol Whip Shrimp
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2017, Pistol Whip Shrimp is a top-down, 2D twin-stick shooter where you control a robot pistol shrimp defending an ancient artifact against waves of mechanical hostile fish.

Credits:

Designers/Programmers:

  • Mitchel Johnson
  • Josh Crane
  • Lachlan Morrow

Artists:

  • Duncan Rabone

Audio:

  • Abbysynth
  • Ari Gross
  • Callum Wakeling
